=Script Command Categories=

All available commands are described on a single page so that you can later print that page to use as a reference.  Usually all command which compare etc. are case insensitive. But, there are some commands having a "X" at the end. These commands work like that ones without the "X", but case sensitive.
 
  * [wbscriptFile_Operations File Operations]
  * [wbscriptRegistry_Handling Registry Handling]
  * [wbscriptINI_Manipulation INI Manipulation]
  * [wbscriptAttachments Attachments]
  * [wbscriptText_Files  Text Files]
  * [wbscriptIF_Clauses_and_Command_Blocks If / Else]
  * [wbscriptRetrieve_Functions Retrieve Functions]
  * [wbscriptString_Formatting String Formating]
  * [wbscriptNetwork_Tools Network Tools]
  * [wbscriptMiscellaneous_Commands Miscellaneous Commands]
